Title: WindowsXAppRemover
Description:
Remove Modern UI (Metro) Apps from Windows!

With the Windows X App Remover, you can easily read out which Apps are installed and remove the ones you don't want
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Remove Modern UI (Metro) Apps from Windows!

With the Windows X App Remover, you can easily read out which Apps are installed and remove the ones you don't want


Info for Usage

  • Supported Windows images: install.wim of Windows 8, Windows 8.1 and Windows 10. You may encounter errors with other .wim files.
  • A help file is included in the program.

System Requirements

  • dotnet Framework 4.0 or higher
  • For full support, you need Windows 10
X -> supported
_ -> not supported

Used OS Windows 8 Windows 8.1 Windows 10
Windows 8 X
Windows 8.1 X X _
Windows 10 X X X
